channel.title: Making a ld client fullscreen! [read and reply]
channel.description: hey moparscapers, just wondering if you can make a LD client fullscreen? maybe you put some stuff from a HD fullscreen client into a LD one, that might work? if so please email me at beanburrito1@hotmail.co.uk. Smiley
